Title: Crime and Punishment
Description: The story of former student Rodion Raskolnikov, who commits a murder and struggles to justify his actions.

Title: Fahrenheit 451
Description: A future world where firefighters burn books, and one of them begins to question the system's validity.

Title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
Description: The first book about the adventures of young wizard Harry Potter at Hogwarts School.

Title: The Master and Margarita
Description: A fantastical story about the devil's visit to 1930s Moscow and the events that follow.

Title: A Brief History of Time
Description: A popular exposition of cosmological theories, including the Big Bang and black holes.
